name: Simulate index matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-9.1.0-36e2232efc1d07df8fb774a89dc671aea85c9e44 "index template [winning_v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [winning_v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
